extendedInfo.description: Pirates! Showdown is a fast-paced game combining real-time strategy(RTS) and defense tactics.3rd place on list of best Android tablet games!Digital Trends"Seriously, this is a very cool game!"AndroidGameplay4You5 Stars - Wickedly entertaining A must have5 Stars - Awesome Most addicting game on android!!!!5 Stars - Great game Easy to play, many skill levels, totally entertaining.Face off against the fearsome Red Hand privateers in thrilling head-to-head pirate battles on the high sea!  Capture towns and other structures to strengthen your defense and increase your gold supply.  Capture your enemy's base to win, but make sure you are also defending your own base!INSTANT ACTION RTS!Fast paced gameplay with RTS and defense tactics without heavy resource management or the need to micro-manage units.WEIGH ANCHOR!Command your fleet of pirate ships as you send them to intercept the enemy pirates or lay siege to land targets.  Send an armada of Brigantines or save your gold for a massive Ship of the Line!CAPTURE!Towns, guard towers, shipyards, lighthouses, mystical obelisks, and more can all be captured.  Structures all have a unique purpose and will supply you with gold, attack your enemy, buff up you ships, allow you to launch more ships, etc.UPGRADE!Upgrade towns to increase gold production.  Upgrade guard towers to increase their firepower and strengthen your defenses.STRATEGY!Will you aggressively capture towns to loot their gold or invest in the towns you have to increase their gold production?  Wage a purely pirate ship battle or strengthen your defenses with upgraded guard towers?  Find the right RTS strategy to beat each level.50 UNIQUE LEVELS IN THREE WORLDS!Combat the enemy in the tropical Caribbean then follow them into Hades in the River Styx world.  And the Open Sea world have the largest levels of any of them.ADJUSTABLE AI DIFFICULTY!Set the game to be as easy or as difficult as you want.  Set the AI to adjust to your skill or set it to play a completely even/fair match every time.  Pirates of all strategy skill levels should be satisfied***GALAXY S4 note***The crash bug that was affecting some Galaxy S4 users should be fixed now.  Please email us at support@flashpointgames.com if you experience any problems.

reviews.title: Nice RTS that works great on my Nexus 7 first generation.
reviews.comment: Graphics are nice and smooth. Gameplay is challenging but fun. Overall well worth the money.
reviews.author: Dan Edwards

reviews.comment: Really good and great value, if I had to make a bad comment it would be that the game is over too quick. That said its great for the cost
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whats not to like?
reviews.comment: Well balanced, great graphics, challenging gameplay and excellent sound effects/music. Well worth the buy. Please add more levels. Arrrr!
reviews.author: Alec Coakley

reviews.title: Needs UPDATE, fun
reviews.comment: I play it all the time. Smooth graphics, good strategy game but simple. Brilliant! Maps r getting old, update needed.
reviews.author: Dean Chatman

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money
reviews.comment: Can\'t direct ships or their attack. Very disappointing. Easy level is far from easy. Lacks fun. This becomes very frustrating very quickly.
reviews.author: Rafzakael .

reviews.title: Game was ok for a couple of hours
reviews.comment: I understand the intent was to keep the game simple in regard to not having to micro-manage a lot of things, but with this simplicity comes some flaws. The game was ok for a couple of hours but then I realized it\'s weaknesses. You\'re either going to win easily on a level or you will not based on what kind of adaptive mode the game is in. There doesn\'t seem like much middle ground where you need to irk out a win by the skin of your teeth. I\'m using the normal adaptive level and I notice certain times it\'ll end up having ships out way faster than is possible (second town isn\'t even managed yet so if the rate of gold growth is the same it\'s impossible for it to have the number of ships out that it does.) So you lose the level and then it adapts and then it\'s too simple.. it\'s all a matter of who grabs the extra towns first..but the issue is there isn\'t that much skill involved in doing so. Granted I\'m only level 20 of the first set of maps so maybe it changes later? However, on level 20 I notice the impossible goofiness I just described above big time...it has way too many ships out too quickly. I\'m sure the level will adapt in  gold growth rate, but the AI isn\'t really adapting.
reviews.author: Rick Reumann

reviews.title: great time killer
reviews.comment: good graphics and music...killed one afternoon with it!
reviews.author: Theodor Gaboras

reviews.title: Arrrr...mateys!
reviews.comment: Fun, an excellent time waster 4 we fans of the high seas.
reviews.author: Gawen Crow

reviews.title: Need more maps
reviews.comment: Love the game needs new levels.
reviews.author: Adam Cotten

reviews.title: Bug S4
reviews.comment: When do you plan on fixing the S4 bug? Game does not start.
reviews.author: Joe Evenwel

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: I have an S4 and it keeps crashing on it. It\'s fun, but there should be more to do. Great customer service though.
reviews.author: Richard Truong
